entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 14. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 14 April 2023
